attributes.action: Send £3000 to each taxpayer as long as they spend it not save it instead of bailing out useless companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current economic climate nobody can afford to spend very much money but the government can spend billions on companies that go into administation with time anyway if the government simply sent each taxpayer £3000 on the condition they spent it then it would flood the market with money and ensure the survival of any companies that are popular or useful enough to the public

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
